law.catch_line: Each health occupations board shall adopt specific sanctioning guidelines, including:...

text.section:
Each health occupations board shall adopt specific sanctioning guidelines, including:
A range of sanctions that is based on historical data or a normative process for each type of violation; and
A list of mitigating and aggravating circumstances that may be used to decide if a sanction falls within or outside the established range of sanctions.

Sanctioning guidelines adopted under this section shall:
Conform to a general framework or incorporate a common set of elements; and
Be used as a guide for sanctioning licensees and certificate holders in formal and informal proceedings.

section.section: To the extent a health occupations board departs from the sanctioning guidelines adopted under this section, the board shall state its reasons.
A departure from the guidelines alone is not grounds for any hearing or appeal of any board action.
